mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (user_name, nickname, email, password, phone_number, birth_date, kakao_id, naver_id, profile_image, role_id) VALUES (#{userName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthDate}, #{kakaoId}, #{naverId}, #{profileImage}, #{roleId})
INSERT INTO USER_TIER (user_id, tier_level, total_spent) SELECT user_id, 1, 0 FROM USER WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
SELECT role_id FROM USER WHERE user_id = #{userId}
